<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/72984</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>72984</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ab0282ee-12a2-11d8-9145-d64dc9453a34#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Felfedező utak a 15-17. században</string>
            <string language="en">Discovering journeys in the 15-17. centuries.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entdecken von von Reisen in den 15-17. 
Jahrhunderten.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Découvrir des voyages en 15-17. siècles.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descobrindo viagens nos 15-17. séculos.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scoperta dei viaggi nei 15-17. secoli.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακάλυψη των ταξιδιών στους 15-17. αιώνες.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descubrir viajes en los 15-17. siglos.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Sorra megtekinthetők a nevezetesebb felfedező utak útvonalai - interaktív feladat</string>
            <string language="en">You can see the notable discovery journeys one by one - interactive exercise</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">földrajzi felfedezések,  Kolumbusz,  Diaz,  Vasco da Gama,  Amerigo Vespucci,  Drake,  Cook,  Magellán,  </string>
            <string language="en">geographical discoveries, Columbus, Diaz, Vasco da Gama, Amerigo Vespucci, Drake, Cook, Magellan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie können die bemerkenswerte interaktive Übung der 
Entdeckungreisen eins nach dem anderen sehen -</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous pouvez voir l'exercice interactif notable de voyages 
de découverte un -</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você pode ver o exercício interativo notável das 
viagens da descoberta um por um -</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potete vedere l'esercitazione interattiva notevole di 
viaggi di scoperta uno per uno -</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορείτε να δείτε τα ξεχωριστά ταξίδια 
ανακαλύψεων ένας-ένας - διαλογική άσκηση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted puede ver el ejercicio interactivo notable de los 
viajes del descubrimiento uno por uno -</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geographische Entdeckungen, Columbus, Diaz, Vasco da 
Gama, Amerigo Vespucci, Drake, Koch, Magellan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">découvertes géographiques, Columbus, Diaz, da Gama, 
Amerigo Vespucci, Drake, cuisinier, Magellan de Vasco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descobertas geográficas, Columbo, Diaz, da Gama de 
Vasco, Amerigo Vespucci, Drake, cozinheiro, Magellan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scoperte geografiche, Columbus, Diaz, da Gama, Amerigo 
Vespucci, Drake, cuoco, Magellan di Vasco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωγραφικές ανακαλύψεις, Κολόμβος, Diaz, gama του 
Vasco DA, Amerigo Vespucci, πάπια, Cook, Magellan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">descubrimientos geográficos, Columbus, Diaz, da Gama, 
Amerigo Vespucci, Drake, cocinero, Magellan de Vasco</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
